riverguides.name: Manuel
riverguides.bio: Manuel has been living in Idaho since forever. Really appasionate in looking for new adventures. If you like extreme sports he's your guy!

riverguides.name: Rosemary
riverguides.bio: While starting to change her life she moved to Idaho . She fall in love inmediately and now she does what she likes. She has been working with us since forever and love her

riverguides.name: Luther
riverguides.bio: Since he got an accident that changed his life for good he decided to give it a try and do something different that how he discovered the place and thanks to discipline he could get better and now he's a wonderful guide
